m_szDocSumamry: 2016 Audi Q7 Debuts With Plug-In Diesel Hybrid Option December 17th, 2014 by Christopher DeMorro   Originally posted on GAS2 Ahead of its debut in Detroit, the 2016 Audi Q7 has broken cover, trimming the fat, building muscle, and for the first time offering a plug-in hybrid diesel drivetrain . This will make the new Q7 among the lightest, most powerful, and most efficient full-size luxury SUVs ever built.
